data.title: Canada Place, Vancouver
data.meta_description: Do you want to know the entry ticket price for Canada Place? Opening & closing timings, parking options, restaurants nearby or what to see on your visit to Canada Place? Click Now to check the details!
data.text:
A multi-function venue, the Canada place is where popular cruises ships are welcomed. The facility includes the Vancouver Convention Centre East that hosts a number of events annually and the World Trade Centre office tower among others. The most popular annual events including the Canada Day and the Christmas Parade are held here.

The place also marks the beginning and end of the Seawall and a walk here on any day with the view of the Burrard Inlet, is a mesmerizing experience.

Entrance Ticket Details For Canada Place

For ticket prices of events held here, visit the official website.

Canada Place Hours

For timings of events held here, visit the official website.

How to Reach Canada Place

By Bus: WB w Cordova St NS Granville St

By Skytrain: EB w Cordova St NS Seymour St

By Ferry: Waterfront Stn SeaBus Southbound

By Taxi

By renting a Car/ Bicycle/Scooter.
